content.raw:
I made a some changes:

* 230d2cb: Avoid using `frames.at()` to prevent a segfault when the function is called on a removed shape
* 193af0a: Fix conversion from local to world frame. Adding a rotation to the sphere in `falling.world` caused the test to fail and led me to the fix. I left the rotation in there since it doesn't break other tests. 

It would be nice to move the bounding box tests to `ShapeFeatures_TEST` at some point, but not a critical right now.
content.html:
I made a some changes:

  • 230d2cb: Avoid using frames.at() to prevent a segfault when the function is called on a removed shape
  • 193af0a: Fix conversion from local to world frame. Adding a rotation to the sphere in falling.world caused the test to fail and led me to the fix. I left the rotation in there since it doesn't break other tests.

It would be nice to move the bounding box tests to ShapeFeatures_TEST at some point, but not a critical right now.
